name: Boom Plague
description:
This was a little school game project with friends
The game is Bomberman  couch co-op game where you battle your  friend in a 1v1 arena.

The game might not scale properly if you are not playing with full HD

Install:

Its a unity game so you download the zip and extract it to place where you want to download it.  ->   After that you can find the game inside the folder and start the game "Boom Plague.exe"
